channel.title: Scorned using TB after win
channel.description:
#### What happened?I won d2 as scorned, could not use trollbox after
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? new patch says i am suppose to be able to use it?
#### Steps to reproduce: win as Scorned on d2 and try to use troll box
#### Comments: in game as I write this...already won so...lol....everyone is telling me it should be fixed as of now so....

Yea…it said it was updated on my steam client
